timeline.bodyText: We said that we need to wait for the in-progress task if any.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: I don't think we ever came to a conclusion on how we wanted to behave, but I'm happy to have this method block until everything is done, if that's what is desired.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: How long should we wait before bailing out, do you think?
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: I made it wait 5 seconds. Happy to tweak it if there's a better number.
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.message: Make the shutdown block until all the tasks are complete (or 5 seconds, whichever is shorter)

timeline.bodyText: If we cannot stop the previous export we should not start a new one :)
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

timeline.message: only run the final export if we can shut down the executor properly
